title: FDA says rapid COVID tests may be less accurate with Omicron
content:
1. FDA says rapid COVID tests may be less accurate with Omicron  New York Post
  2. Have omicron variant symptoms? Why you can’t get a rapid COVID test  Deseret News
  3. FDA: Antigen tests may have reduced sensitivity detecting Omicron  POLITICO
  4. U.S. FDA: Antigen tests have reduced sensitivity to Omicron variant | ANC  ANC 24/7
  5. FDA Says Rapid Tests at Home Have ‘Reduced Sensitivity’ for Omicron  New York Magazine
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: FDA、COVIDの迅速検査はOmicronでは精度が低い可能性があると発表
美国食品和药物管理局表示，使用Omicron的快速COVID测试可能不太准确
